- I told you, you don't have to do that.
- The point I want to make is: You didn't need to do this.
You didn ' t need to come after what she did to you.
Look, I know what you did was hard, but you had no choice.
So we know you did not have time to kill your wife.
You say there was no choice but there was, John.
But you didn't think this thing through,so now it's up to me to help you out,okay?
It's true you should have told me... but it's also true that I wouldn't be here if it weren't for you.

And it's not like you all haven't done the exact same thing.
Look, I know it's none of my business, but, um, I just wondered if you two had maybe ever...

Oh, well, from what I hear, you had nothing to make up for.

if you hadn't told me, I could just not tell him, but since you told me...

no say in your own destiny... like you have no control over your own body, walking through life like that is what's crazy.
